metadata.title: CVE-2011-4898 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** wp-admin/setup-config.php in the installation component inWordPress 3.3.1 and earlier generates different error messages for requestslacking a dbname parameter depending on whether the MySQL credentials arevalid, which makes it easier for remote attackers to conduct brute-forceattacks via a series of requests with different uname and pwd parameters.NOTE: the vendor disputes the significance of this issue; also, it isunclear whether providing intentionally vague error messages duringinstallation would be reasonable from a usability perspective.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
